name: Condor Social LLC
tagline: Condor Social - A Social Media management company
description:
Condor Social is a social media-marketing agency. We create and manage top-performing social media campaigns for business. Our company manages social media networks such as Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram on your behalf. We help businesses of all sizes with social media. We use the most relevant social media marketing strategies to help businesses grow and meet goals. Create your custom quote on our social media management pricing plans page
 
CONTRACT LENGTH 30-DAY NOTICE
CANCELLATION POLICY
Our services will render for an initial period of 6 months. If you are unhappy with our service, you can cancel at any time on a month-to-month basis. We will not bind you in a long-term agreement if you are unhappy. However, we do expect that you know great results will take time (6-12 months)
